text:
SCHEDULE OF UPCOMING EVENTS
March 28-29
Public TV Stations meet in Washington
to consider forming new licensees'
organization.
March 28-29
Hearings on S1090, the Pastore-Magnuson
Public Broadcasting financing bill for
FY '74-'75.
April 5-6
Meeting of NER Board, Denver
May 21-24
Public Radio Stations meet in Washington
